title: Cox's Bazar Beach Escape
description: Enjoy the world’s longest sea beach, local seafood, and calm sunsets at Cox’s Bazar. Ideal for couples, families, or solo travelers.

tourPlan.activities: Departure from Dhaka, check-in at sea view hotel, evening walk by the beach
Visit Himchari, Inani Beach, and enjoy local seafood lunch
Shopping from Burmese market and return journey

title: Sundarbans Wildlife Expedition
description: Explore the world’s largest mangrove forest and spot rare wildlife like Royal Bengal Tigers, spotted deer, and exotic birds on a tranquil boat journey.

tourPlan.activities: Depart from Khulna, board the launch, and begin forest river cruise
Jungle walk in Kotka, birdwatching at dawn, tiger sighting spots
Canoe ride near narrow mangrove creeks, visit local fishing village
Return from cruise and transfer to Khulna city

title: Saint Martin's Coral Island Adventure
description: Crystal blue waters, coral reefs, and beach bonfires await on Bangladesh's only coral island. Ideal for snorkeling and sunset lovers.

tourPlan.activities: Arrive via Teknaf trawler, check-in, explore West Beach
Boat ride to Chera Dwip, snorkeling and photography
Sunrise walk, seafood breakfast, return to mainland

title: Bandarban Tribal Hills Trek
description: Experience the serene hills of Bandarban, visit tribal villages, and hike trails like Nilgiri and Nafakhum surrounded by clouds and waterfalls.

tourPlan.activities: Depart from Dhaka, check-in at resort near Meghla
Visit Nilachal, explore tribal markets and local culture
Hike to Nafakhum waterfall, river trekking
Visit Nilgiri and Chimbuk Hill, scenic photography
Morning rest and departure

title: Sylhet Tea Garden & Waterfall Tour
description: Visit Sylhet’s lush tea gardens, serene waterfalls, and natural landmarks like Ratargul swamp forest for a peaceful escape.

tourPlan.activities: Arrival, explore Lakkatura tea estate and local restaurants
Boat trip to Ratargul swamp forest and visit Jaflong
Visit Madhabkunda waterfall, return journey

title: Rangamati Lake & Tribal Culture Tour
description: Sail on the vast Kaptai Lake and experience the colorful tribal culture, Chakma Rajbari, and natural peace of Rangamati hills.

tourPlan.activities: Bus ride from Chittagong, lake view resort check-in
Boat tour on Kaptai Lake, visit Chakma Rajbari
Explore local markets and return trip

imagePrompts: Sunset view over Kaptai Lake with orange reflections on calm water

title: Srimangal Tea & Rainforest Retreat
description: Known as the tea capital of Bangladesh, Srimangal offers a calm retreat with Lawachara rainforest, tribal communities, and 7-layer tea.

tourPlan.activities: Arrival, visit Lawachara rainforest and tribal villages
Taste 7-layer tea, explore tea estates, return home

title: Paharpur & Mahasthangarh Archaeology Tour
description: Step back into history with guided tours to Paharpur Buddhist Monastery and Mahasthangarh ruins in North Bengal.

tourPlan.activities: Train to Bogura, visit Mahasthangarh ancient city ruins
Travel to Paharpur, explore UNESCO heritage site
Visit local museum, return by train

title: Kuakata Sunrise to Sunset Tour
description: Witness both sunrise and sunset over the sea at Kuakata beach, a rare gem in southern Bangladesh.

tourPlan.activities: Bus ride to Kuakata, beach hotel check-in
See sunrise in early morning and explore dry fish market
Watch sunset, visit Buddhist temple, depart

title: Bhawal National Park Forest Daytrip
description: A short forest escape from Dhaka with wildlife, greenery, and a refreshing picnic vibe for families or groups.

tourPlan.activities: Morning drive from Dhaka, jungle walk, boating, picnic, return
